id: Freelance Business Dashboard for Creatives: Notion Template
name: Freelance Business Dashboard for Creatives: Notion Template
description: Simplify your freelance workflow with the Freelance Business Dashboard for Creatives. Designed for creative professionals, this Notion template is the ultimate tool for staying organized without the overwhelm.
